scripts.prebuild:demo:android:apk: test -f "andesDemo-v$(ionic config get version | tr -d \').apk" && echo "No se puede hacer build: andesDemo-v$(ionic config get version | tr -d \').apk ya existe." && exit 1
scripts.prebuild:prod:android:aab: test -f "andesProd-v$(ionic config get version | tr -d \').aab" && echo "No se puede hacer build: andesProd-v$(ionic config get version | tr -d \').aab ya existe." && exit 1
scripts.version:update: npm version "$(ionic config get version | tr -d \')" --allow-same-version && config-cordova -config=config.xml set version "$(ionic config get version | tr -d \')" && echo Version: $(ionic config get version)
scripts.sign:demo:apk: jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore andes-key.jks -storepass $(cat build-andes.json | json android.release.storePassword) -keypass $(cat build-andes.json | json android.release.password) $PWD/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk andes-release
scripts.zipalign:demo:apk: ${ANDROID_SDK_ROOT:-$ANDROID_HOME}/build-tools/$(ionic config get buildToolsVersion | tr -d \')/zipalign -v 4 $PWD/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk "andesDemo-v$(ionic config get version | tr -d \').apk"
scripts.zipalign:demo:aab: ${ANDROID_SDK_ROOT:-$ANDROID_HOME}/build-tools/$(ionic config get buildToolsVersion | tr -d \')/zipalign -v 4 $PWD/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab "andesDemo-v$(ionic config get version | tr -d \').aab"
scripts.sign:demo:aab: jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore andes-key.jks -storepass $(cat build-andes.json | json android.release.storePassword) -keypass $(cat build-andes.json | json android.release.password) $PWD/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab andes-release
scripts.build:demo:android:aab: npm run version:update && npm run config:demo && npm run prepare:demo && npm run bundle:demo:android && npm run sign:demo:aab && npm run zipalign:demo:aab
scripts.build:demo:android:apk: npm run config:demo && npm run prepare:demo && npm run compile:demo:android && npm run sign:demo:apk && npm run zipalign:demo:apk
scripts.build:demo:ios: npm run config:demo && npm run prepare:demo && npm run compile:demo:ios
scripts.config:prod: npm run version:update && config-cordova -config=config.xml set id "org.andes.mobile"
scripts.sign:prod:apk: jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore andes-key.jks -storepass $(cat build-andes.json | json android.release.storePassword) -keypass $(cat build-andes.json | json android.release.password) $PWD/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk andes-release
scripts.sign:prod:aab: jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore andes-key.jks -storepass $(cat build-andes.json | json android.release.storePassword) -keypass $(cat build-andes.json | json android.release.password) $PWD/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab andes-release
scripts.zipalign:prod:apk: ${ANDROID_SDK_ROOT:-$ANDROID_HOME}/build-tools/$(ionic config get buildToolsVersion | tr -d \')/zipalign -v 4 $PWD/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk "andesProd-v$(ionic config get version | tr -d \').apk"
scripts.zipalign:prod:aab: ${ANDROID_SDK_ROOT:-$ANDROID_HOME}/build-tools/$(ionic config get buildToolsVersion | tr -d \')/zipalign -v 4 $PWD/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab "andesProd-v$(ionic config get version | tr -d \').aab"
scripts.build:prod:android:apk: npm run config:prod && npm run prepare:prod && npm run compile:prod:android && npm run sign:prod:apk && npm run zipalign:prod:apk
scripts.build:prod:android:aab: npm run config:prod && npm run prepare:prod && npm run bundle:prod:android && npm run sign:prod:aab && npm run zipalign:prod:aab
scripts.build:prod:ios: npm run config:prod && npm run compile:prod:ios
scripts.android:reinstall: ionic cordova platform rm android && ionic cordova platform add android
